objective: Unify the codebase by moving all agent-related code into the `src/specialists` directory and deleting the redundant `src/agents` directory.
rationale: The current file structure has two directories (`src/agents` and `src/specialists`) representing the same concept. This violates the 'single source of truth' principle defined in `DEVELOPERS_GUIDE.md` and creates confusion. We will standardize on the term **Specialist**.

steps.description: Delete the file `src/agents/base.py` as it is a duplicate of `src/specialists/base.py`.
Search the entire codebase for any import statements that reference the old directory, specifically `from src.agents...`, and change all occurrences to `from src.specialists...`.

definition_of_done: The `src/agents` directory no longer exists. All relevant code resides in `src/specialists`. The application runs successfully without any `ImportError` exceptions when executed via `python -m src.main`.
